      • setUnknownTags

        public void setUnknownTags(java.util.List<java.lang.String> removedTags)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to remove the Bad structure names from Tab4, after they are marked RED,two steps are taken: First Step: Remove from the database (update the tag). Step Two: Keep the UI as it is with selected rows in Red color
        Parameters:
        removedTags - : List of structures that should be removed

      • finalizeTermCategoryTable

        public int finalizeTermCategoryTable()
        merge grouped_terms and group_decision table and add data into term_category table, which may already have data also add newly learned structure term to the table for category "structure" This makes term_category contain all new terms learned from a volume of text

      • insertTypo

        public void insertTypo(java.lang.String typo,
              java.lang.String correction)
        insert a record into the known typo database table. if (correction, typo) exists in the table, just remove the record, not need to insert (typo, correction).
        Parameters:
        typo -
        correction -
